Node.definition: = man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= a type of song (שִׁיר) probably to be accompanied by musical instruments
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= a certain quantity that fill a certain container
primarily used in poetry: = the earth as opposed to the sky, with special focus on the area that is inhabited by humans
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water
= causative action by which humans put in place the bottom part of a building or larger structure, usually below the ground level, which will have to bear the entire construction
= water under the earth
= causative action by which humans or deities cause an object to be firmly located in a certain place

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified

Node.gloss: to go up|to climb up|to mount
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals or objects go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot, carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified
= state in which by which humans or objects have become part of the realm of God and his service ► and therefore no longer accessible to humans unless they have gone through special rituals
= state in which humans are not held responsible for actions committed in the past or for future commitments

literally: palm of the hand, but used in a figurative sense with the focus on the activities that are performed with one's hands; = someone's actions, whether or not performed with one's hands, for which one is personally responsible
= state in which an event happens entirely as desired or required, without any interference that could be considered a flaw
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to count on|to be intent on|to desire
Node.definition: literally: to put (one's heart or soul) on something or someone; hence: = action by which humans turn to a deity or location with the confidence that they will find help and support there
= state in which objects or activities do not serve a valid purpose and can only lead to disappointment

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= action by which humans or deities make a solemn statement often calling on a higher power to confirm that what is said is true or to punish the speaker if it turns out not to be true
literally: to hold, carry; hence: = process by which humans undergo certain processes or actions initiated by (other) humans or deities
= action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, and events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= a state in which a human or deity helps a human in need to be safe / a safe state
= group of people sharing a certain characteristic or behavior, usually in poetic texts
= action where humans make an intensive effort to associate with a deity, to serve and worship him, and to get answers to questions
literally: to seek (someone's) face); hence: = action by which humans make an intensive effort to be in the presence of another human or deity

= man, also known as Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) ◄ second son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) ► one of the patriarchs of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel
literally: to lift up (one's) face or head); hence: = action by which humans look up without shame
literally: head; hence: = the topmost part of a vertically oriented object, such as a mountain, and the principal part of an horizontally oriented object, such as a street or a bed
literally: to lift up (one's) face or head); hence: = action by which humans look up without shame
= the opening by which a person enters or exits an enclosed space, such as a house, a tent, a temple, or a larger area like a city; it can also be used figuratively to denote the mouth
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= position of honor; ◄ often as a result of wealth and/or authority

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= position of honor; ◄ often as a result of wealth and/or authority
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which humans or deities are able to perform powerful acts
= a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof
literally: a hero of battle; hence: = a valiant soldier
literally: to lift up (one's) face or head); hence: = action by which humans look up without shame
literally: head; hence: = the topmost part of a vertically oriented object, such as a mountain, and the principal part of an horizontally oriented object, such as a street or a bed
literally: to lift up (one's) face or head); hence: = action by which humans look up without shame
= the opening by which a person enters or exits an enclosed space, such as a house, a tent, a temple, or a larger area like a city; it can also be used figuratively to denote the mouth
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= position of honor; ◄ often as a result of wealth and/or authority

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= position of honor; ◄ often as a result of wealth and/or authority
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

literally: YHWH (or one of the other names of God of a combination thereof) of Hosts; hence: = epithet of God with focus on his being in charge of the host of heavenly beings surrounding his throne, praising him, and carrying out his will in earth; ≈ as an epithet it relates to God's power and control of the cosmos as the divine king and warrior
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= position of honor; ◄ often as a result of wealth and/or authority
